agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Intergovernmental Relations TIME & DATE: 9:30 AM, Monday, March 18, 2019 PLACE: E1.028 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Eddie Lucio, Jr. The Senate Committee on Intergovernmental Relations will meet to consider the following: SB 285 Miles Relating to information and outreach regarding hurricane preparedness and mitigation. SB 385 Nelson Relating to a common characteristic or use project in a public improvement district in certain municipalities. SB 386 Nelson Relating to a common characteristic or use project in a public improvement district in certain municipalities. SB 428 Lucio Relating to a study of using a single intake form for state and federal disaster assistance. SB 642 Johnson Relating to a common characteristic or use project in a public improvement district in certain municipalities. SB 674 Campbell Relating to authorizing an exemption for open-enrollment charter schools from certain municipal drainage requirements. SB 857 Lucio Relating to requiring training for certain emergency management coordinators. SB 1474 Lucio Relating to private activity bonds allocated for affordable housing. For members of the public who wish to provide oral testimony, please limit prepared remarks to three (3) minutes. If providing written testimony, please submit twenty (20) copies, with your name on each copy, to the Committee during the hearing. Copies will be distributed to Committee Members and will be part of our public record.
